contentrichtext.text: {{About||the debut album by a British band [[Magnum (band)|Magnum]]|Kingdom of Madness (Magnum album)}} {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Kingdom of Madness | Type = studio | Artist = [[Edguy]] | Cover = Kingdom of madness.jpg | Released = February 8, 1997 | Recorded = Phoenix Studio, [[Herne, Germany]] | Genre = [[Power metal]] | Length = 59:15 | Label = [[AFM Records|AFM]] | Producer = [[Edguy]] & Erik Grösch | Last album = ''[[Savage Poetry]]''<br />(1995) | This album = '''''Kingdom of Madness'''''<br />(1997) | Next album = ''[[Vain Glory Opera]]''<br />(1998) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|3|5}}<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.allmusic.com/album/kingdom-of-madness-mw0000465477 | title = Edguy Kingdom of Madness review | accessdate = 2012-10-07 | last = White | first = David | work = [[Allmusic]] | publisher = [[Rovi Corporation]]}}</ref> | rev2 = [[Sputnikmusic]] | rev2Score = {{Rating|3|5}}<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.sputnikmusic.com/review/42216/Edguy-Kingdom-of-Madness/ | title = Edguy - Kingdom of Madness | accessdate = 2012-10-07 | date = 5 March 2011 | last = Martin | first = Alec | publisher = [[Sputnikmusic]]}}</ref> | rev3 = ''[[Metal Hammer]]'' (GER) | rev3score = {{Rating|6|7}}<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.metal-hammer.de/suche/?searchString=edguy&from=01.01.1900&to=01.01.2100&pub=mth&src=all&src=wbs&src=pct&sortBy=score&filter=review | title = Edguy Metal Hammer Suchergebnis | accessdate = 2012-10-07 | date = July 1997 | publisher = ''[[Metal Hammer]]'' | language = German}}</ref> | noprose = yes }} '''''Kingdom of Madness''''' is the second [[album]] by the [[Germany|German]] [[power metal]] [[Musical band|band]] [[Edguy]], released in 1997. It is usually referred to as their "official" debut album since it was the first to be professionally recorded and to receive [[record company]] distribution. ==Track listing== All lyrics by [[Tobias Sammet]].
